#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long long int reverse(long long int x)
{
	long long int y=0;
	while(x)
	{
		y*=10;
		y+=x%10;
		x/=10;
	}
	return y;

}

bool isPalin(long long int x)
{
	if(reverse(x)==x) return 1;
	return 0;
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{	
		long long int x;
		cin >> x;
		int count=0;
		while(!isPalin(x))
		{
			x+=reverse(x);
			count++;
		}
		cout << count << " " << x << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
